description: Bodybuilder Adam has become a successful personal trainer since he last appeared on Maskurbate. He's back to give us his own after-the-gym smoothie recipe that invigorates muscles and keeps a good muscle tone. Fortunately it was so hot in my kitchen that he made himself comfortable by stripping naked while making it. In addition, he almost forgot about the special ingredient. A joy to watch! Welcome back Adam!
title: Adam's Smoothie, Scene #01
